block.p: BASEBALL American League ANAHEIM ANGELS - Signed INF Kevin Stocker. CLEVELAND INDIANS - Assigned RHP Jared Camp and OF Dave Roberts to Buffalo of the International League. Recalled 3B Russell Branyan from Buffalo. Activated OF Jolbert Cabrera from the inactive list. DETROIT TIGERS - Placed INF Gregg Jefferies on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled C Javier Cardona from Toledo of International League. YANKEES - Activated OF Felix Jose from the 15-day disabled list. Designated OF Lance Johnson for assignment. SEATTLE MARINERS - Placed RHP Gil Meche on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to May 29. Recalled RHP Kevin Hodges from Tacoma of the Pacific Coast League. TEXAS RANGERS - Voided the option of RHP Danny Kolb to Oklahoma of the PCL and placed him on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to May 27. National League ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS - Placed RHP Todd Stottlemyre on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Vicente Padilla from Tucson of the PCL. ATLANTA BRAVES - Purchased the contract of RHP Don Wengert from Richmond of the International League. CINCINNATI REDS - Agreed to terms with SS Juan Castro on a two-year contract extension. METS - Placed SS Rey Ordone on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled INF Melvin Mora from Norfolk of the International League. SAN DIEGO PADRES - Placed LHP Sterling Hitchcock on the 15-day disabled list Designated LHP Matt Whisenant for assignment. Purchased the contract of RHP Adam Eaton from Mobile of the Southern League. Recalled RHP Rodrigo Lopez from Las Vegas of the PCL. Reassigned Ben Oglivie, hitting coach, to Peoria of the Arizona League. Named Duane Espy hitting coach.

NBA- Fined Portland Trail Blazers F Schottie Pippen $10,000 for hitting Los Angeles Lakers C John Salley in the back of the head with a forearm in Sunday's Game 4 of the Western Conference finals. ORLANDO MAGIC - Named Paul Pressey assistant coach.

DALLAS COWBOYS - Released RB Dan Murphy, MIAMI DOLPINS - Re-signed RB Autry Denson and WR Robert Baker to one-year contracts. NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS - Waived CB J'Juan Cherry. PITTSBURGH STEELERS - Released S Travis Davis. Signed S Brent Alexander. WASHINGTON REDSKINS - Signed CB Darrell Green to a five-year contract. Waived T Kareem Ellis.
